text:
Mr* John R. Brugger
Board of Education
of Washington County
Hagerstown, Maryland
Dear John:
It was nice of you to send the material distributed
at your meeting* We certainly hated to miss it*
looks like a real project. I hope you now have
(nearly) adequate help and are ore settled.
e * 11 make it your way yet. Meanwhile regards to
Anne, John and others we know, and more power
to you.
Sincerely,
Hairy J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/hek
